mapper.update: insert into AmazonVCDailySales ("Asin", "ProductTitle", "ShippedCogs", "ShippedCogsOfTotal", "ShippedCogsPriorPeriod", "ShippedCogsLastYear", "ShippedUnits", "ShippedUnitsOfTotal", "ShippedUnitsPriorPeriod", "ShippedUnitsLastYear", "CustomerReturns", "FreeReplacements", "SubcategorySalesRank", "SubcategoryBetterWorse", "AverageSalesPrice", "AverageSalesPricePriorPeriod", "ChangeInGlanceViewPriorPeriod", "ChangeInGlanceViewLastYear", "RepOos", "RepOosOfTotal", "RepOosPriorPeriod", "LbbPrice", "ShippedCogsNum", "ShippedCogsOfTotalNum", "ShippedCogsPriorPeriodNum", "ShippedCogsLastYearNum", "ShippedUnitsNum", "ShippedUnitsOfTotalNum", "ShippedUnitsPriorPeriodNum", "ShippedUnitsLastYearNum", "CustomerReturnsNum", "FreeReplacementsNum", "SubcategorySalesRankNum", "SubcategoryBetterWorseNum", "AverageSalesPriceNum", "AverageSalesPricePriorPeriodNum", "ChangeInGlanceViewPriorPeriodNum", "ChangeInGlanceViewLastYearNum", "RepOosNum", "RepOosOfTotalNum", "RepOosPriorPeriodNum", "LbbPriceNum" , "ReportingRange", "ViewingDate", "ViewingDateEnd", "DistributorView", "SalesView", "InsertedAt") values (#{asin},#{productTitle},#{shippedCogs},#{shippedCogsOfTotal}, #{shippedCogsPriorPeriod},#{shippedCogsLastYear},#{shippedUnits}, #{shippedUnitsOfTotal},#{shippedUnitsPriorPeriod},#{shippedUnitsLastYear}, #{customerReturns},#{freeReplacements},#{SubcategorySalesRank}, #{SubcategoryBetterWorse},#{AverageSalesPrice},#{AverageSalesPricePriorPeriod}, #{ChangeInGlanceViewPriorPeriod},#{ChangeInGVLastYear},#{RepOOS}, #{RepOOSofTotal},#{RepOOSPriorPeriod},#{LBBPrice}, dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedCogs}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedCogsOfTotal}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedCogsPriorPeriod}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedCogsLastYear}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedUnits}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedUnitsOfTotal}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedUnitsPriorPeriod}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{shippedUnitsLastYear}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{customerReturns}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{freeReplacements}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{SubcategorySalesRank}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{SubcategoryBetterWorse}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{AverageSalesPrice}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{AverageSalesPricePriorPeriod}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{ChangeInGlanceViewPriorPeriod}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{ChangeInGVLastYear}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{RepOOS}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{RepOOSofTotal}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{RepOOSPriorPeriod}), dbo.AmazonNumberStrToFloat(#{LBBPrice}), #{reportingRange},#{viewingDate}, #{viewingDateEnd}, #{distributorView}, #{salesView}, getdate())
